text: AI should not belong in labs; it should be in developers' hands.
Frontier AI should be accessible, not a privilege.
High performance does not have to be huge.
Small models are not a compromise.
Small yet powerful models change reality.
Benchmarks are not decoration; they are proof.
Closed systems create speed, but open systems create evolution.
Value comes not from the model alone but from connectivity.
AI should not be confined to the cloud.
Inference speed is part of the philosophy.
Slow intelligence will not be used.
Real developers choose implementation over theory.
Performance is measured in the field, not on paper.
AI is a tool, not a research result.
A tool needs to fit the hand.
High accuracy is meaningless if conditional.
OCR is not a research problem; it's an operational problem.
Multimodality is not the future; it is the present.
Publishing an API is publishing a philosophy.
Comparison charts are not marketing; they are the battlefield.
Small models will change the economy.
Compute cost is a barrier to democratization.
Design is what breaks that wall.
AI must not be monopolized by giant companies.
Open weights are an investment in the future.
Fairness means anyone can use it.
Benchmarks are the past; the field is the present.
Developers' time is the most expensive resource.
A good model is one that shortens that time.
Models are judged by efficiency, not beauty.
Updates are the continuation of philosophy.
A model release is a declaration.
A release is not the end; it is the start of dialogue.
A model is complete only when used.
Implementation is the proving ground of philosophy.
Open source is a mechanism for sharing speed.
The edge is a symbol of freedom.
Local execution is emancipation from dependency.
AI that does not depend is strong.
Design philosophy matters more than parameter count.
More than standalone strength, strength of connections.
APIs are the language of connection.
Models are the implementation form of philosophy.
Implementation is the interface with reality.
Practicality is design that withstands noise.
Model size is both a constraint and a weapon.
Open weights are a contract of trust.
An accelerating ecosystem cannot be stopped.
Releasing a model is a declaration.
It is a declaration that we will not hide.
Comparison tables are a challenge letter.
Showing numbers means not running away.
Small plus high performance is a revolution.
Saving compute resources is care for the planet.
AI design is also ethical design.
Practicality is the concretization of ideals.
Speed is the quality of experience.
Continued use is the true evaluation.
Evaluation is the voice of the market.
Being unfinished leaves room for evolution.
Small models are an explosion point of possibility.
A world where anyone can experiment creates the future.
Experimentability is the mother of innovation.
Innovation does not come from monopoly.
What matters is usability in daily life.
Document processing is the gateway to revolution.
Mundane challenges are the biggest ones.
Big markets begin with small frictions.
AI is an amplifier of creation.
Noise control is the craft of design.
Small models are easier to control.
A model is both a tool and a philosophy.
Design is an accumulation of choices.
Publishing APIs is also a philosophy.
Prioritizing speed is also a philosophy.
(From here, we rapidly expand the philosophy with high density.) AI moves toward optimization, not gigantism.
Performance speaks through proof, not hype.
Inference efficiency is the currency of the future.
Strength within constraints is the real thing.
From here, we fire at an even higher level of abstraction.
Local is at hand for humans.
Freedom is the number of choices.
Design is the embodiment of philosophy.
Philosophy without implementation is empty theory.
We need AI that people accept.
To be accepted, it must be understandable.
Trust is the foundation of the market.
If the foundation is strong, you can build higher.
What we build up is community.
When everyday life changes, the world changes.
What can be measured can be improved.
